page.title: 04Police Station contd.
page.content: The new station is to open on{July {15th.1985.}It has been built for a Sergeant and eight Constables.There are two offices-one for the Sergeant and one for the{C.I.D}officer as well as the foyer which is the main office type area for the Constables, the public stop at a smart blue counter just inside the front door.{The Police {Station}is not as big as the old one and all the rooms are fairly small. It has got a Ladies toilet, which the old one did not have, a rest room and a kitchen for the policemen. There are no cells and criminals are taken to {Clacton}for detention. The windows in the roof have been specially designed so that rain can not get in even if the windows are open.
